channel.title: Appreciation on Jiufeng

item.title: Five things I felt grateful for today
item.author: lijiufeng97@gmail.com (Jiufeng Li)
item.description:
1. Grateful for the continuous rainy days in Heidelberg; the weather is great, and I’ve been sleeping really well.

  2. Grateful to my roommate for making me a Captain Morgan drink. It has a bit of a herbal medicine taste, but it’s not bad.
